headline: Oppenheimer Raises PTC (PTC) Price Target, Maintains Outperform Rating
summary: PTC Inc. (NASDAQ:PTC) is one of the Best Industrial Automation Stocks to Buy for the Next Decade. Oppenheimer has raised its price target on PTC Inc. (NASDAQ:PTC) to $190 from $170, maintaining an Outperform rating on the stock. The upward revision reflects improved market multiples and optimism surrounding PTC’s go-to-market (GTM) execution and AI integration plans. Following a […]
